author: psmith
msg: Moved the CloseIcon class into a new LineIconFactory
class based in the icon sub-package, and added Expand/Collapse line based icons.

author: psmith
msg: Updated the dialog displayed when no Receivers are defined.
Can now choose either a SocketReceiver or SocketHubReceiver
as part of the simple receiver creation process.
These 2 are the most probably receivers to be created by
new users, so this seems appropriate to have.

author: psmith
msg: Delete action and Pause action seemed to share the
same accelerator, so when you wanted to pause
it actually removed all the events from the view.
Updated the Welcome help file with the correct hot keys.

author: psmith
msg: * Event Detail and Tooltip now rendered by a Layout class.

author: psmith
msg: Small modification because of change from Vector -> LoggingEvent
